entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burgeo 1:30 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: 2.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 1.6°C
Wind: S 53 km/h gust 63 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Rain along the coast. Blowing snow inland. Amount 5 to 10 cm except 20 cm inland. Wind south 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 15 except minus 19 inland.
entry.summary: Snow ending early this evening then cloudy with flurries beginning near midnight. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Low minus 15 except minus 19 inland. Wind chill minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or snow squalls. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls. Blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023
